messages.message:
unfortunately, we'll need to use the `cypress` template for a while, until we move Cypress CI to use the `ibdev-backend` template (which is desired, but requires time to implement)

not sure if anyone is still using the `ibdev` template though! :eyes:
Yes, indeed...I would say take no action until it becomes painful, and then bite the bullet and switch to ibdev-backend at that point.
Saw 6 sandboxes using frontend and 3 using ibdev. But some of those poeple have since left Instabase.
hmm i think @Weiming Wu is the only one still using the `frontend` template? maybe @Paul H?
I'm still using `frontend` , though admittedly it's slowly falling apart more and more over time :sweat_smile:
btw i switched to `ibdev-backend` pretty seamlessly in january! in case you need any extra encouragement to move off `frontend` :sweat_smile:
I’ve moved over to `ibdev-backend`, most of the time it works (but lately having sandbox issues sad)
But I haven’t used `frontend` or `ibdev` in ages
